qa_pairs.question: How do I reset my password?

answers.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.
You can also reset your password by contacting our support team at 1-800-123-4567. They will guide you through the process and may ask for identity verification.
We are open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM EST. We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

qa_pairs.question: How can I contact customer support?

answers.answer: You can reach our customer support team by phone at 1-800-123-4567, by email at support@company.com, or through our live chat feature on our website.
For urgent technical issues, please call our 24/7 emergency support line at 1-800-EMERGENCY. This line is available for critical system issues only.
We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in original condition with all packaging. Some items may have different return terms.
For software and digital products, returns are accepted within 7 days of purchase. Physical products have a 30-day return window.
To initiate a return, log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the item you want to return, and follow the return process. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label.
Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders over $50. Orders under $50 have a flat shipping rate of $5.99.
Premium members get free shipping on all orders regardless of amount. You can upgrade to premium for $9.99/month.

qa_pairs.question: How do I track my order?

answers.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section, or by using the tracking number sent to your email.
You can also track your order by entering the tracking number directly on our website's tracking page, or by calling our order support line.

qa_pairs.question: What payment methods do you accept?

answers.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
For business accounts, we also accept wire transfers and purchase orders. Contact our sales team for business payment options.

qa_pairs.question: How do I update my account information?

answers.answer: To update your account information, log into your account and go to 'Account Settings'. You can modify your personal details, shipping addresses, and payment methods there.
For security reasons, some account changes (like email address) may require verification. You'll receive a confirmation email to complete the process.
Most products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranties are available for purchase on select items.
Software products have a 90-day warranty. Hardware products have a 1-year warranty. Extended warranties can extend coverage up to 3 years.

qa_pairs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?

answers.answer: To cancel your subscription, go to your account dashboard, select 'Subscriptions', and click 'Cancel Subscription'. You can also contact customer support for assistance.
You can cancel anytime, but no refunds are provided for partial months. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

metadata.description: AI FAQ Assistant Knowledge Base with support for multiple answers per question
